claim_card.claim: The transcript is asserted to evidence a paradigm shift from linear explanations (backprop/stepwise) to non-linear recursive dynamics.
claim_card.test_hook: Blind-rate transcript passages: do independent reviewers identify a consistent shift in explanatory primitives away from stepwise computation?
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: demonstrates a shift from linear, mechanistic accounts of AI ... to non-linear recursive dynamics
